column2: Plan
Make a cleaning checklist. Declutter each room. Dust surfaces. Vacuum or sweep floors. Mop floors. Clean windows. Scrub bathrooms. Clean Kitchen. Change bed linens

              X(clean_kitchen ->
                X(change_bed_linens)))))))))

column1: Create Shopping List and send to master
column2: Enter the kitchen.Open the refrigerator and pantry.Check the current stock of food items.Identify items that need to be replenished.Take inventory of perishable and non-perishable goods.Compile a list of items to purchase based on inventory.Organize the list by category (e.g., produce, dairy, pantry items).Ensure the list is comprehensive and accurate.Send shopping list to master.

G(enter_kitchen ->
  X(open_refrigerator_and_pantry ->

            X(organize_list_by_category ->
              X(ensure_comprehensive_and_accurate_list ->
                X(send_shopping_list_to_master)))))))))
